title: CMS releases new batch of research data from LHC

short_description.content: Today, the CMS Collaboration at CERN has released more than 300 terabytes (TB) of high-quality open data. These include over 100 TB, or 2.5 inverse femtobarns (fbâˆ’1), of data from proton collisions at 7 TeV, making up half the data collected at the LHC by the CMS detector in 2011.

author: CMS Collaboration
